parameters.name: Accelerate
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable an acceleration link for image subscription. The subscription acceleration feature is in public preview. The feature is optimized based on scheduling policies and network links to accelerate image subscription.

parameters.name: NamespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the Container Registry namespace.

parameters.name: Override
parameters.description: Specifies whether to overwrite the original image.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description: The operating system and architecture. If the source repository contains multi-arch images, only the images with the specified operating system and architecture are subscribed to the destination repository of the Enterprise Edition instance.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the Container Registry repository.

parameters.name: SourceNamespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the source namespace.

parameters.name: SourceProvider
parameters.description:
The source of the artifacts.

Valid values:

*   DOCKER_HUB: Docker Hub
*   GCR: GCR
*   QUAY: Quay.io

parameters.name: TagRegexp
parameters.description: The image tags in the subscription source repository. Regular expressions are supported.
